fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.asynccall

Interface AsyncCallCI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentInterface, OfferedCI, java.rmi.Remote, RequiredCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsyncCallConnector, AsyncCallInboundPort, AsyncCallOutboundPort

    public interface AsyncCallCI
extends OfferedCI, RequiredCI
    The component interface AsyncCallCI defines the signature to be used to perform an asynchronous call.

    Description

    The call itself is represented by a Command pattern where the abstract class AbstractAsyncCall is inherited by all user command classes. All such command instances have an URI for each call so that the result can be sent back to the caller by another asynchronous call with this URI and the result as parameters. Hence, the caller can know to which call correspond which result.

    White-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no invariant

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no invariant

    Created on : 2021-04-13

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void asyncCall(AbstractAsyncCall c)
      pass the command representing the call to the server to be executed asynchronously.
      void disconnectClient(java.lang.String receptionPortURI)
      disconnect the result reception outbound port on the server side at the end of a series of calls from the client that owns the result reception inbound port having receptionPortURI as its URI.

    • Method Detail

      • disconnectClient

        void disconnectClient(java.lang.String receptionPortURI)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        disconnect the result reception outbound port on the server side at the end of a series of calls from the client that owns the result reception inbound port having receptionPortURI as its URI.

        Contract

         pre     receptionPortURI != null && receptionPortURI.length() != 0
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        receptionPortURI - URI of the inbound port waiting for the result of a call.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
